name: AbdulKalam
0:
”Alexa ask Kalam Simulator sir motivate me”
”Alexa ask Kalam Simulator give me a motivational quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kalam simulator
des: You can ask questions and receive the audio clips based on the famous speeches of APJ Abdul Kalam. You can ask for his famous quotations and his info as well. The main motto of this skill is to "Bring back the dead person's wisdom".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
